pr_title: Change the AS path and add IBM i specific flags

timeline.message:
Change the AS path and add IBM i specific flags

Signed-off-by: gaoli <gaolibj@cn.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Could you clarify why ths line is only needed for I5_VERSION? It seems to be general.
timeline.author: gita-omr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -126,6 +131,11 @@ ifneq (,$(findstring xlclang++,$(notdir $(CXX))))
   CXX_FLAGS+=-fno-rtti
 endif
 
+ifdef I5_VERSION
+# Added i5 os specific flags
+  CX_FLAGS_EXTRA+=$(USERCFLAGS)

replies.bodyText: USERCFLAGS is set by our build script to add i5 os specific flags.
replies.author: gaolibj
